code: export var emailValidator=function emailValidator(value){return value.includes('@')&&value.trim()!=='';};export var nameInputValidator=function nameInputValidator(value){return value.trim()!=="";};export var postalCodeInputValidator=function postalCodeInputValidator(value){return!isNaN(value)&&value.length>0&&value.length<6;};export var cityInputValidator=function cityInputValidator(value){return value.trim()!=="";};
